title: For Florida A&M, Getting on the Field Is Just One of Many Problems
description: The university’s football players nearly skipped their opening game in protest of their mismanaged athletic department. Recent history shows far more dysfunction within the university’s sports program.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:credit: Malcolm Jackson for The New York Times
media:description: Bragg Memorial Stadium in Tallahassee, Fla., is the home of Florida A&M football.
